QuestData.Title: Journey into Thunder Bluff
QuestData.Description: The wells are cleansed, and Mulgore's waters run sweet and clear once more. You've saved us...but you've also uncovered grim happenings. The actions of the Grimtotem must be made known.$B$BIt is time for you to enter Thunder Bluff, our great city atop the mesa. Go to our leader, Baine Bloodhoof, son of Cairne. He must hear of this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Baine Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Thunder Bluff, $n. You've done great things for our people.$B$BTell me of your journey.
